name: Once Letter
description:
Once Letter: new game trend!

Say " STOP" to the Rock/Paper/Scissors game to decide between two people ... Once Letter allows for duels between two people of any age!

And yes ! This game is free more ...

The rules are simple :
- 2 players are needed
- Player 1 starts and chooses a letter
- Player 2 plays in turn and must select a letter not already selected
- The game ends when one player selects a letter already chosen

In two words : Have fun !
